entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
